task_description: Build a Minesweeper clone that matches the original Windows Minesweeper game feature set exactly.

patterns.cell_model: Cell class with mine, revealed, flagged, adjacent_mines properties
patterns.game_state: Enum with PLAYING, WON, LOST states
patterns.board_structure: 2D array (list of lists) of Cell objects with (row, col) coordinates
patterns.difficulty_config: Dictionary with rows, cols, mines for Beginner/Intermediate/Expert
patterns.flood_fill: Stack-based iteration to avoid recursion on large boards
patterns.first_click_safety: Generate mines AFTER first click to ensure safety
patterns.chording: When flags_placed === cell_number, reveal all unflagged neighbors
patterns.win_condition: All non-mine cells revealed: revealed_count == (rows * cols) - mine_count
